title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: Notice that the 'Open Project' menu item is available but the 'Close Project' option is not.
EB: Both 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' options should be available when multiple projects are selected.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 2. Select P2. 3. Attempt to close P2.
